content: two stitches together the hang of it and joining for working in the round p = purl without twisting the stitches takes more attentiveness pm = place marker than a standard long-tail cast-on but the difference in repeat = repeat the edge s elasticity and seamless look make the round s = round s trouble worth it trust me st st = stockinette stitch st s = stitch es © 2013 julie hayes franklin fiber |3| www franklinfiber wordpress com
